title: 820-2915-B Headphone jack problem
message:
I know this thread is exactly 2 years ago, I came across the same exact symptom.

It turned out being a broken trace on AUD_IPHS_SWITCH_EN between a test pad and U2152. 
The test pad is next to R6880-1 / U6880-3 (under the annoying foam).
U2152 doesn't show up on boardview but it's the same on 820-3215 (U2652).

Probably other issues may cause the same symptom but I thought it may be helpful for someone.
